name: business-scrape-tool
description: Tool untuk scraping nomor bisnis tanpa website untuk B2B lead generation

scripts.help:
echo 'Available commands:
  npm run setup     - Interactive setup wizard
  npm run campaign  - Create and run campaigns
  npm run web       - Start web dashboard
  npm run web:dev   - Web dashboard development mode
  npm start         - Run with CLI arguments
  npm run dev       - Development mode with auto-reload'
